title: Club Tag Disappeared
body:
After the the clubs outage back in October was fixed, everything was normal with my club. However last week when I hopped in a game of League, I noticed that my Club Tag was changed to something random. I still could see my Club and it still had the same Club Name, but the Club Tag disappeared for some strange reason. I contacted Riot Support already and they said they were going to restore my Club to display the correct Club Tag and Name, however I saw no changes on my client.

If any Rioters are reading this, could you look into this and help restore my Club's Tag back to what it was?

Club Information is Below:
Server: NA
Club Name: Rito Games
Club Tag: RITO
Summoner Name of Club Owner: SpectreFour
Date When I First Noticed this Issue: November 28, 2016 (Issue could have occured at an earlier date, but this was the first time I logged in and noticed it)

Thanks,

SpectreFour

replies.body: our captain has the same problem he still is leader but he cant see he's club or club tag  :s

We aren't equipped to handle Club name changes or disputes here on H&S, but if you reach back out in your ticket, we'll take another look at this.

Let me know if you have any questions!
